title: Sinclair QL documents manuals and magazines
description:
2009 is the year of the 25th anniversary of the QL. For several months
in Sinclair QL Spanish Resources been preparing for this event a wide
collection of PDF material about the QL now put at your disposal.

More than 100 manuals, books and magazines (yes, in English) that have
gone through the scanner with better or worse luck in terms of quality
concerns, but that insurance will be useful for the community because
this material years ago which has started to dwindle and unfortunately
we are increasingly less to keep alive the flame of QL.

The documents include:

The book "The definitive handbook QL SuperBASIC" by Jan Jones, the
creator of the QL programming language: The SuperBASIC. This is a book
published by McGraw Hill and was re-edited by Quanta later.

It also highlights the manual "QL Technical Guide" by Tony Tebby, with
all the secrets on a QDOS programmer.

The manuals include also the "QL Users Guide" and the "QL Service Manual".

Items on the other hand is varied: Leguajes programming and compilers,
toolkits and extensions to the operating system, game manuals, manuals
of many productivity programs, manuals on specific hardware, 5 books and
12 issues of the journal QL World.

And the thing does not end here, as we have several books and manuals in
preparation.
    
DOWNLOADS:

All this documentation is available on the link:
http://sinclairql.es/archivo/docs/docs.htm

CONTRIBUTE:

The web, as always, is open to anyone who wants to contribute. If you
have any book, magazine or manual, contact us to tell the best way to
pass the documents to PDF.

To contact use the e-mail: sinclairql AT badared DOT com

We sincerely hope you enjoy learning with this material.

Happy 25th anniversary!

Javier Guerra (aka badaman)
Sinclair QL Spanish Resources
http://sinclairql.es
